item.title: RT by @Astron6: #Junesploitation Day 23: Giallo! I chose The Editor (2014). My short hand for this is think Naked Gun but for the Giallo genre. True brilliance from @Astron6 ! This film brings me such joy and we did an episode about it with an editor who worked on PIG.
item.dc:creator: @VHUS_Podcast
